alert.note: Alert for Bernalillo; Catron; Cibola; Los Alamos; McKinley; Rio Arriba; Sandoval; Santa Fe; Socorro; Taos; Valencia (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 22 at 12:44PM MST until February 22 at 1:45PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southwestern Taos County in north central New Mexico... Los Alamos County in north central New Mexico... Eastern Cibola County in west central New Mexico... East central McKinley County in west central New Mexico... Northwestern Valencia County in central New Mexico... Southeastern Rio Arriba County in north central New Mexico... Sandoval County in north central New Mexico... Northwestern Santa Fe County in north central New Mexico... Northwestern Socorro County in central New Mexico... Bernalillo County in central New Mexico... Northeastern Catron County in west central New Mexico... * Until 145 PM MST. * At 1244 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Abiquiu to 11 miles north of Datil, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 60 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 101 and 159. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 233 and 250. Highway 285 between Mile Markers 337 and 356. Highway 550 between Mile Markers 1 and 56. Locations impacted include... Albuquerque, Rio Rancho, Los Alamos, Espanola, Corrales, Bernalillo, Los Ranchos De Albuquerque, White Rock, Santo Domingo Pueblo and Jemez Springs. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Avoid or delay travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents.

area.areaDesc: Bernalillo; Catron; Cibola; Los Alamos; McKinley; Rio Arriba; Sandoval; Santa Fe; Socorro; Taos; Valencia
